dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze information using a systematic and methodical approach, focusing on evidence and facts.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and creative thinking to explore solutions, often considering unconventional perspectives.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on local or national concerns, with limited consideration of global implications.
Your FarTwin will take a holistic approach to global issues, recognizing interconnectedness and considering diverse perspectives.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tend to prefer one-on-one interactions or solo activities, feeling drained by large social gatherings.
Your FarTwin will thrive in social settings, often seeking out group activities and enjoying the energy of others.

dimensions.label: Professional Goals
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach career advancement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for leadership roles and high achievement, driving themselves to succeed.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, focusing on steady growth and incremental progress.

dimensions.label: Intellectual Curiosity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach lifelong learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out new knowledge and experiences, often exploring unconventional topics.
Your FarTwin will tend to rely on established wisdom and authority, preferring tried-and-true approaches.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive to create original and groundbreaking works, often pushing boundaries.
Your FarTwin will focus on precision and polish, aiming for mastery of established techniques.

dimensions.label: Attitude towards Failure
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle setbacks or mistakes?

options.description: Your FarTwin will bounce back from failures, using them as opportunities for growth and learning.
Your FarTwin will struggle with self-doubt and disappointment, sometimes becoming discouraged or giving up easily.
